dct_title_s: Portugallia et Algarbia quae olin Lusitania
dct_alternative_sm: Portugallia et Algarbia quae olin Lusitania / auctore Vernando Alvero Secco.
dct_description_sm: Decorative cartouche includes men with astronomical instruments and illustrations of Neptune and ships on the ocean. Two coats of arms are included.
This state was published in atlases by Jan Jansson in 1636, 1637, and 1680.
From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
